infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so ordinary all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the attic. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a spare room.



There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A normal one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just walked into a basement. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a kitchenette.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. An usual one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: coin
infos.desc: The coin looks out of place here

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, try to venture east. Then, venture south. After that, try to go to the south. Once you succeed at that, try to go west. If you can finish that, try to move north. That done, make an effort to take a trip east. After that, retrieve the coin from the floor of the basement. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
